content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for considering my apartment for your rental needs. I am confident that this apartment would be a great fit for you. Let's discuss the rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Mister Heine, I would like to negotiate the price of the apartment. Can we discuss it further?

I am a student, so I am looking for a budget-friendly option.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Nesibe. I am open to discussing the rental price with you and finding a mutually beneficial agreement. Let's continue our conversation and see what we can come up with.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Mister Heine, I am willing to accept the rental price of 600 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 600 Euros.

I would also like to know if there are any additional fees or charges that I should be aware of.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Great, Nesibe! I am pleased to hear that you are willing to accept the rental price of 600 Euros per month. As for additional fees or charges, there may be a security deposit that you will need to pay upon signing the lease agreement. The amount of the security deposit will be discussed further in our next meeting.
name: Heinrich Heine
